title: Have you ever unexpectedly come across a picture of someone you know while doing an unrelated internet search? - Quora

response.answer_text: This may be far off, but my school regularly posted newspaper articles on our athletes in the cafeteria for everyone to read. I didn't regularly check up on it and decided to look at it for once and found an article on me:  (On the right)

My mother’s name was Cleo. We weren’t together for most of my childhood. While doing an internet search for “Cleopatra”, I came upon a picture of my mother as a young woman. I don’t think I ever saw any picture of her, let alone that one. Mom was a beautiful woman.
